scripts.build:services: npm run build --prefix services/chat-service && npm run build --prefix services/notification-service && npm run build --prefix services/project-service && npm run build --prefix services/team-service && npm run build --prefix services/user-service
scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm start --prefix services/chat-service" "npm start --prefix services/notification-service" "npm start --prefix services/project-service" "npm start --prefix services/team-service" "npm start --prefix services/user-service"
